title: script/handwritten font, PLease help
content:
Does anybody know which font Elle is using here? It´s two different ones I think.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091005013236im_/http:/typophile.com/files/77d58ea07b0f83c6_ELLE_UK_DECEMBER_MATTHIAS_VRIENS_3613.preview.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091005013236im_/http:/typophile.com/files/kylie-minogue-for-elle-uk-may-5_5041.jpg)
author: hsl

comments.content:
I checked the Script Guide and Dafont for anything like these and found nothing that matched. The top one is probably hand-drawn, and in any case it is probably not the same font as the “HOW TO WEAR IT” lettering, if it is a font. The latter is surely a font, but may be a custom-made one, since that style can be made by anyone very cheaply, and with no skill.

I am not sure I understand searching for exact matches for fonts like this, because there are hundreds of free fonts that would have the same feeling, if not the identical details.

- Mike Yanega
